source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_00<tab>Notched Bone seems convinced that the goblins have brainwashed the citizens of Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_00<tab>Notched Bone veut ouvrir les yeux aux humains d'Idyllée.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_01<tab>Notched Bone is still convinced that the goblins have brainwashed the citizens of Idyllshire, and you are unable to convince him otherwise. He hopes to cure the citizens of this brainwashing by exposing what he thinks is a grand, nefarious scheme by the goblins. He saw a goblin armed and heading out towards the Collectors' Quarter and he is sure she was up to no good. Perhaps if you find out what this goblin is <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> up to, you can convince Notched Bone that they can be trusted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_01<tab>Notched Bone pense que tous les humains d'Idyllée ont subi un lavage de cerveau, et il veut leur ouvrir les yeux sur les plans perfides des Gobelins. Pour l'aider dans cet objectif, il vous a demandé d'aller voir ce que manigance un Gobelin armé qu'il a vu partir en direction du quartier des Collectionneurs.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_02<tab>You speak with the goblin and learn that she is exterminating the damselflies in the area. Apparently there are egg-bearing damselflies nearby which must be eliminated before they can lay their eggs. If they do, the young that hatch will quickly get out of hand. Help the goblin by slaying three of the damselflies.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_02<tab>Le Gobelin armé était parti éliminer de dangereux insectes volants qui sont venus pondre leurs œufs dans le quartier des Collectionneurs. Il vous a demandé de l'aider, pour le bien des habitants d'Idyllée.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_03<tab>With the damselflies slain, the risk of them breeding out of control has been negated. Let the goblin know that there is no more work to be done here.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez réglé leur compte aux dernières <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF210CD0302 /var> qui menaçaient la tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té du quartier des Collectionneurs.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_04<tab>The goblin happily thanks you for helping her finish her work so quickly. The area should now be much safer for the inhabitants of Idyllshire. Return to Notched Bone with this proof that the goblins are kind-hearted and trying only to help.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_04<tab>Le Gobelin armé vous a remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour votre aide. Allez raconter à Notched Bone ce qui s'est passé.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_05<tab>You explain to Notched Bone that the goblin he saw was simply keeping the surrounds of Idyllshire clear of dangerous monsters, but he remains unconvinced. He somehow still thinks that the goblins are up to no good─despite all evidence to the contrary.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_SEQ_05<tab>Notched Bone a refusé de croire que le Gobelin armé était véritablement parti éliminer de dangereux insectes pour le bien d'Idyllée. Il est persuadé que les Gobelins ont de mauvaises intentions, et il espère avoir d'autres occasions de les révéler.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the goblin in the Collectors' Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_TODO_00<tab>Parler au Gobelin armé dans le quartier des Collectionneurs

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_TODO_01<tab>Slay an egglaying damselfly at the designated areas.

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_TODO_03<tab>Parler à Notched Bone à Idyllée

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>Everyone here's been brainwashed by them goblins, I tell you! We gotta find some kinda proof that they're evil. Then everyone'll come to their senses!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_000<tab>Les pauvres, ils savent pas. Il faut réveiller les gens. Ils sont pas <var 1A 02 /var>conscients<var 1A 01 /var> qu'ils ont tous subi un lavage de cerveau par les Gobelins. Il faut leur prouver que ces brigands masqués sont dangereux.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_001<tab>As luck would have it, I just saw summat mighty suspicious. This goblin was armed to the teeth and headin' out towards the Collectors' Quarter!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_001<tab>Mais j'ai l'œil, moi<var 1D /var>! J'en ai justement vu un armé jusqu'aux dents partir en direction du quartier des Collectionneurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>There ain't nothin' dangerous out there, so what does she need them weapons for? She's definitely up to no good.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_002<tab>Il paraît pourtant que c'est un endroit tranquille. Pourquoi aurait-il besoin d'être armé pour y aller<var 1D /var>? Pour moi c'est clair, il prépare un mauvais coup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>I don't know why you look so unconvinced! It's clear there's somethin' crooked goin' on. Go out there and check for yourself!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_003<tab>Si vous voulez nous aider à ouvrir les yeux aux gens, allez voir ce que fait ce Gobelin pour révéler à tout Idyllée les plans perfides de son peuple<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_013<tab>Go out to the Collectors' Quarter and find the goblin I was talkin' about. Once we uncover whatever it is they're plottin', all these poor brainwashed folk oughta come to their senses.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_013<tab>Vous verrez ce que je vous ai dit<var 1D /var>! Ce Gobelin armé prépare un mauvais coup dans le quartier des Collectionneurs<var 1D /var>! Et je compte sur vous pour le prouver<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
What can I help you with, uplander? I am in middle of exterminating damselflies.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Pshhh...
Le gentil Gobelin est venu éliminer les méchants insectes volants.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_011<tab>I found damselflies heavy with eggs! Let egg-laden damselflies be, and they will multiply out of control! It will quickly become big, big problem. People might get hurt!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_011<tab>Ils veulent pondre leurs œufs ici. Si on les laisse faire, il y en aura plein, et cet endroit deviendra très dangereux. Plein de gens pourraient se faire attaquer.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_012<tab>You come with good timing, uplander. Can you help me exterminate damselflies?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_012<tab>L'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> arrive au bon moment. <var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> va pouvoir aider le gentil Gobelin à éliminer les méchants insectes volants pour le bien des habitants d'Idyllée.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_020<tab>Can you help me exterminate damselflies, uplander? We cannot let them be. If eggs hatch, they will be too many to handle!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_020<tab>L'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> doit aider le gentil Gobelin à éliminer les méchants insectes volants qui veulent pondre leurs œufs ici. C'est pour le bien des habitants d'Idyllée.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_030<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Thank you, uplander! With this, damselfly exterminating is now complete. Collectors' Quarter is much safer now!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_030<tab>Pshhh... Pshhh...
Un grand merci <var 08 E905 ((à la gentille aventurière)) ((au gentil aventurier)) /var><var 1D /var>! <var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> a éliminé les derniers méchants insectes volants qui voulaient pondre leurs œufs ici.

TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_GOBLIN01951_000_035<tab>Le gentil Gobelin va rester ici encore un peu pour se rafraîchir, mais <var 08 E905 ((la gentille aventurière)) ((le gentil aventurier)) /var> peut reprendre sa route si <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> veut.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_040<tab>Well that didn't take long, did it? Did you find out what they're up to? She was probably a murderer or summat, judgin' by them weapons she was carryin'...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_040<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Vous avez fait vite<var 1D /var>! Alors, est-ce que vous avez découvert ce que manigance ce Gobelin armé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_041<tab>Wh-What!? Riddin' the area of dangerous monsters!? That makes her sound more like a hero than a murderer. In fact, it makes her sound a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> good. It's clearly a cover for summat much more horrible.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_041<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Il était parti éliminer de dangereux insectes volants<var 1D /var>!? Ou en tout cas c'est ce qu'il vous a fait croire. C'est louche...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_042<tab>Maybe we weren't able to get to the bottom of their schemes this time... But mark my words, I'll catch 'em out. ...Maybe after I've had a bite to eat.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ821_01951_NOTCHEDBONE_000_042<tab>Je ne me laisserai pas berner, moi. On n'a pas réussi à prouver ses mauvaises intentions cette fois-ci, mais on aura d'autres occasions<var 1D /var>! Bon, en tout cas, toutes ces histoires me donnent faim...
